mcmti.midnightconfig.title: §bMicrophone Text Input Mod Configuration
mcmti.midnightconfig.acousticModelPath.t: §eThe absolute path of the acoustic model. Please download the acoustic model from VOSK Models
mcmti.midnightconfig.cacheSize.tooltip: §eThe size of the audio cache. The larger the value, the more memory is occupied, and the more accurate the recognition result is.
mcmti.midnightconfig.sampleRate.tooltip: §eThe sample rate of the audio. Please confirm if your microphone supports this sample rate.
mcmti.midnightconfig.autoSend.tooltip: §eAutomatically send the recognized text to the chat box. If this option is disabled, you need to manually send the recognized message.
mcmti.midnightconfig.prefix.tooltip: §eThe prefix of the recognized text. If the prefix is not empty, the recognized text will be sent to the chat box with the prefix.
mcmti.midnightconfig.encoding_repair.too: §eWarning: This option is still in the beta stage.
mcmti.midnightconfig.srcEncoding.tooltip: §eWarning: This option is still in the beta stage.
mcmti.midnightconfig.dstEncoding.tooltip: §eWarning: This option is still in the beta stage.
mcmti.midnightconfig.mod_name: Mod Name:                    Fabric Microphone Text Input Mod
mcmti.midnightconfig.author: Author:                                          §l§0§9Jaffe2718
